keyMappings:
# unmap youtube shortcuts
unmap i
unmap j
unmap k
unmap l
unmap f
unmap m
unmap c
unmap >>
unmap <<

# new maps
map s scrollDown
map w scrollUp
map q goBack
map e goForward
map a previousTab
map d nextTab
map A moveTabLeft
map D moveTabRight


map S LinkHints.activateMode
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
l: https://www.linguee.de/deutsch-englisch/search?source=auto&query=%s Linguee
# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
 az: https://www.amazon.de/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s QwantJa
git: https://github.com/search?q=%s GitHub
fgit: https://github.com/search?q=user%3Aandreasfelix+fork%3Atrue+%s My GitHub
